import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './Dashboard.css'; import { FaLock, FaLockOpen } from 'react-icons/fa'; const Dashboard: React.FC = () => { const [stats, setStats] = useState({ open: 0, closed: 0 }); const [period, setPeriod] = useState({ from: '', to: '' }); // Placeholder for chart data // Fetch stats from API useEffect(() => { fetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL}/tickets_api.php`, { credentials: 'include' }) .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => { setStats({ open: data.filter((t: any) => t.status === 'nao_aberto' || t.status === 'Open').length, closed: data.filter((t: any) => t.status === 'resolvido' || t.status === 'Closed').length, }); }); }, []); return (
